grails.ui
[Java] Class Console

java.lang.Object
  groovy.ui.Console
      grails.ui.Console

public class Console
extends groovy.ui.Console

Extends regular Groovy console and bootstraps Grails environment before launch to allow interaction with the Grails domain model.

deprecated:
@since 0.2
Authors:
Graeme Rocher
